avdta.vehicle.fuel

Class BEV

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.vehicle.fuel.VehicleClass
      • avdta.vehicle.fuel.BEV

  • public class BEV
extends VehicleClass
    This uses the parametric modeling of vehicle energy consumption to calculate power for battery electric vehicles.
